title: A curated list of extendr-powered R packages
format: gfm
execute:
  echo: false
  warning: false
---

LAST UPDATED: `r format(Sys.Date())`

The below packages use extendr and are currently published on CRAN.

```{r}
#| output: asis
pkgs <- read.csv("cran-pkgs.csv")

Author <- vapply(
  strsplit(pkgs[["Author"]], split = " \\["),
  \(.x) .x[[1]],
  character(1),
  USE.NAMES = FALSE
)

# clean up url strings
URL <- gsub("\\n", "", pkgs[["URL"]])
URL <- gsub(",\\s*", ", ", URL)

first_url <- vapply(
  strsplit(URL, ","),
  \(.x) .x[[1]],
  character(1),
  USE.NAMES = FALSE
)

Package <- ifelse(
  is.na(first_url),
  sprintf("<strong>%s</strong>", pkgs[["Package"]]),
  sprintf("<a href='%s'><strong>%s</strong></a>", first_url, pkgs[["Package"]])
)

Title <- pkgs[["Title"]]

# wrap urls in a-tags, so they render correctly in raw html
URL <- gsub(
  "(^|,\\s*)([^,]+)",
  "\\1<a href='\\2'>\\2</a>",
  URL,
  perl = TRUE
)

# convert na to empty string
URL <- ifelse(is.na(first_url), "", URL)

Description <- gsub(
  "<([^>]+)>",
  "<a href='\\1'>\\1</a>",
  pkgs[["Description"]],
  perl = TRUE
)

list_item_template <- paste(
  "<details>",
  "  <summary>%s: %s</summary>",
  "  <div style='margin-left: 1em;'>",
  "    <strong>Author:</strong> %s<br>",
  "    <strong>URL:</strong> %s<br>",
  "    <strong>Description:</strong> %s",
  "  </div>",
  "</details>",
  sep = "\n"
)

list_items <- sprintf(
  list_item_template,
  Package,
  Title,
  Author,
  URL,
  Description
)

cat(
  "```{=html}",
  paste0(list_items, collapse = "\n"),
  "```",
  sep = "\n"
)
```
